description:
Lilla Katt is a rare find, sexy, beautiful and she LOVES pain mixed with her pleasure. Actually pain enhances her pleasure. Put into very compromising, painful positions, Lilla Katt excels in her non stop orgasms. This pain whore loves sex and having her orgasms dragged out of her so I set her up in positions where I can just sit back and watch her suffer... The more pain & discomfort, the harder she comes & louder she screams & cries out.
During this shoot you may hear some additional sounds of people moving about & cameras clicking. We had a special guest who was present on set doing a photo documentary on my work & other aspects of Kink.com for international print publication. Every once in a while you may hear Shaul Schwartz's or his assistance's camera as they were documenting the shoot. This was also the shoot the beautiful Sabrina Fox was Twittering live from.
title: Lilla Katt: She loves some Pain with her Pleasure
